QuestData.Title: Bolas Bastion
QuestData.Description:
I received word that a coven of harpies and their rocs plan to attack in force.
They'll be coming from the mountains to the north.
Use one of the bolas launchers and I'll man the other.
Quick!
QuestData.CompletionText: Let's show those harpies why they shouldn't even think about attacking Thunder Totem!
QuestData.RewardText: That was some nice work you did there, $n. Thanks for the assist.
